articles.title: Matt Damon and Ben Affleck's studio condemn Donald Trump campaign video - BBC
articles.description: The film studio, owned by the two actors, said it does not grant consent for material to be used.
articles.content:
Matt Damon and Ben Affleck's production company has said it did not consent for its film to be used in a new campaign video by former president Donald Trump.

articles.title: Joni Mitchell makes triumphant return to the stage - BBC

articles.content:
